Our Story

For over a decade, we've been crafting the finest paan in Kolhapur, blending tradition with innovation

About Ruchi Banquets

Located in the heart of Bhavani Mandap, Kolhapur, Ruchi Banquets has been serving premium quality paan for over 10 years. Founded by Dnyaneshwari Ghalsasi and Kavita Ghalsasi, our shop has become synonymous with exceptional taste and quality.

Dnyaneshwari Ghalsasi

Co-Founder

With a passion for authentic flavors, Dnyaneshwari brings traditional recipes to life with a modern twist.

Kavita Ghalsasi

Co-Founder

Kavita's innovative approach has helped create some of our most popular signature paan varieties.

Our Paan Palace

Take a look at our shop and the delicious paan varieties we offer. Each paan is crafted with care using the freshest ingredients.
